Package com.android.controllers.help.speaker

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Speaker_Fragment
    Fragment describing the appearance of each page within a given activity.
    Speaker_help_pager
    Adapter support the display of the view, based on moving between views within a single activity using gestures shift to the left and right.
    SpeakerHelp
    Uses, appropriate to the class name, adapter to create the help view, based on the RelativeLayout's, which can be scrolled using gestures to the left, to the right in the one activity.
